entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 8:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: SW 45 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
